description: This file defines a C++ interface 'IPowerManagerHal' within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, specifying methods for managing power states, wakeup sources, and deep sleep functionalities, designed for mocking/testing purposes in a hardware abstraction layer.
external_files: Core::IUnknown (likely part of the WPEFramework core library)
Ids.h (referenced in comments but not explicitly included here)

classes.name: IPowerManagerHal
classes.description: An interface for power management hardware abstraction, including methods for power state, wakeup source, and deep sleep controls, intended for mocking in tests.

methods.name: PLAT_INIT
methods.description: Initializes the platform power management interface

methods.name: PLAT_API_SetPowerState
methods.description: Sets the power state of the platform

methods.name: PLAT_API_GetPowerState
methods.description: Retrieves the current power state of the platform

methods.name: PLAT_API_SetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Configures the wakeup source for the platform

methods.name: PLAT_API_GetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Retrieves the status of a specific wakeup source

methods.name: PLAT_Reset
methods.description: Resets the platform with a specified state

methods.name: PLAT_TERM
methods.description: Terminates the platform power management interface

methods.name: PLAT_DS_SetDeepSleep
methods.description: Configures deep sleep with timeout and wakeup parameters

methods.name: PLAT_DS_DeepSleepWakeup
methods.description: Wakes up the system from deep sleep

methods.name: PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupReason
methods.description: Retrieves the reason for the last wakeup

methods.name: PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupKeyCode
methods.description: Gets the key code that caused the last wakeup

ctags.name: IPowerManagerHal
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IPowerManagerHal : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
